sentences.en: A: Please tell me what the doping control procedures are?
sentences.cn: 请告诉我,兴奋剂检查有些什么程序?

sentences.en: A: Where are the dressing rooms, doping control station and clinic?
sentences.cn: 更衣室 、 奋剂检查站和医务室在什么地方?

sentences.en: B : Thank you for your congratulations. Who will take the doping test?
sentences.cn: 谢谢. 哪些人要接受兴奋剂检查?

sentences.en: B : When shall I report to the Doping Control Station?
sentences.cn: 什么时候到检查站报到?

sentences.en: Dear athletes, remember that you are role models for the Youth of the World. Reject doping and cheating.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的运动员们，请记住，你们是世界青年的楷模，请拒绝兴奋剂，向作弊说不。

sentences.en: Elliott is a person of integrity, he IAAF anti - doping Commission of one.
sentences.cn: 艾略特是个正直的人, 他还是国际田联 反 兴奋剂委员会的一员.

sentences.en: Experts are also worried that doping can damage a person's health.
sentences.cn: 专家还担心兴奋剂会有损于人体健康.

sentences.en: I am the Doping Control Station officer of the Games.
sentences.cn: 我是运动会兴奋剂检查站工作人员.

sentences.en: I wonder if this person is related to the doping control.
sentences.cn: 我想知道这个人与兴奋剂检查是否有关.

sentences.en: Long - short bond market factors, the fourth quarter of doping.
sentences.cn: 四季度债券市场因素多空掺杂.

sentences.en: Please give me a copy of the doping control official report.
sentences.cn: 请给我一份兴奋剂检查报告的副本.

sentences.en: Rogge said the IOC anti - doping efforts have been fruitful.
sentences.cn: 罗格说,国际奥委会 反 兴奋剂的努力取得了成果.

sentences.en: The Agency and FIFA, we are together to fight against doping.
sentences.cn: 布拉特说:“该机构和国际足联将联手与服用禁行为作斗争. ”

sentences.en: The balance depends on a number of environmental variables including electron doping.
sentences.cn: 它们之间的平横依赖包括电子掺杂在内的许多环境变量.

sentences.en: The best composition of oxides doping CaBi 4 Ti 4 O 15 ( CBT ) ceramic was chosen by perpendicular experiments.
sentences.cn: 采用正交实验优化了各氧化物掺杂CaBi4Ti4O15 ( CBT ) 陶瓷的最佳配方.

sentences.en: The doping is a cancer on the ideal of the Olympic Games.
sentences.cn: 兴奋剂是奥运会的理想相违背的.

trans.tran_cn: （半导体）掺杂（质），加添加剂[填料]
用麻醉药使无知觉( dope的现在分词 )，使昏昏沉沉，给…用兴奋剂，在（食物、饮料）中加入麻醉剂
